author: Jessica
excerpt: Here’s a summer fridays from my favorite place! xo EATING Street corn grilled cheese! And zucchini corn fritters. Also my summer turkey sliders! DRINKING A spicy watermelon sangria. And my favorite rosé aperol spritz. MAKING My favorite hummus platter! Love making this for the weekend. BAKING My blueberry zucchini muffins with lemon glaze. Use up that zucc! […]
text: Here’s a summer fridays from my favorite place! xo EATING Street corn grilled cheese! And zucchini corn fritters. Also my summer turkey sliders! DRINKING A spicy watermelon sangria. And my favorite rosé aperol spritz. MAKING My favorite hummus platter! Love making this for the weekend. BAKING My blueberry zucchini muffins with lemon glaze. Use up that zucc! CRAVING My crispy chicken with avocado cucumber salad. And my jarlsberg cheese dip! GRILLING These summer chicken skewers. And grilled peaches with lavender ricotta! SNACKING On my peach cobbler granola. And summer marinated goat cheese! LISTENING To this country 2K playlist!! Aka, the best early 2000s country hits. READING These Summer Storms! Just started it last night! LOVING This stitchy hemming tool that can fix your clothes in an instant. It is SO great to have on hand if you want to tuck your sleeves, pin your shirt, etc. Definitely worth having on hand. WEARING My favorite woven wide leg pants. Can’t stop with them! And the crochet mixi dress. I think this is my dress of summer. SHOPPING My suitcase is on major sale and I love it. It travels great! And I love the different colors so it’s easy to find. The Nordstrom anniversary sale is still on and I’m doing another pass. These are my favorite jeans ever. This navy bucket bag is amazing. And the leopard socks! BUYING This three-in-one crossbody bag is amazing. Such great quality and just perfect to have as your everyday bag – or even stashed in a larger bag if traveling. I also got a second simple human mirror for our other bathroom – we LOVE these. PREPARING For back to school! I officially wrapped up this week. We have all of our supplies, uniforms, shoes and miscellaneous items. I’ve added to my back to school list. Now the fun part: I always put together some little teacher care packages at the start of the year! TRAVELING To my favorite place this weekend! Woohoo!
html:
Here’s a summer fridays from my favorite place! xo

EATING

Street corn grilled cheese! And zucchini corn fritters. Also my summer turkey sliders!

DRINKING

A spicy watermelon sangria. And my favorite rosé aperol spritz.

MAKING

My favorite hummus platter! Love making this for the weekend.

BAKING

My blueberry zucchini muffins with lemon glaze. Use up that zucc!

CRAVING

My crispy chicken with avocado cucumber salad. And my jarlsberg cheese dip!

GRILLING

These summer chicken skewers. And grilled peaches with lavender ricotta!

SNACKING

On my peach cobbler granola. And summer marinated goat cheese!

LISTENING

To this country 2K playlist!! Aka, the best early 2000s country hits.

READING

These Summer Storms! Just started it last night!

LOVING

This stitchy hemming tool that can fix your clothes in an instant. It is SO great to have on hand if you want to tuck your sleeves, pin your shirt, etc. Definitely worth having on hand.

WEARING

My favorite woven wide leg pants. Can’t stop with them! And the crochet mixi dress. I think this is my dress of summer.

SHOPPING

My suitcase is on major sale and I love it. It travels great! And I love the different colors so it’s easy to find. The Nordstrom anniversary sale is still on and I’m doing another pass. These are my favorite jeans ever. This navy bucket bag is amazing. And the leopard socks!

BUYING

This three-in-one crossbody bag is amazing. Such great quality and just perfect to have as your everyday bag – or even stashed in a larger bag if traveling. I also got a second simple human mirror for our other bathroom – we LOVE these.

PREPARING

For back to school! I officially wrapped up this week. We have all of our supplies, uniforms, shoes and miscellaneous items. I’ve added to my back to school list. Now the fun part: I always put together some little teacher care packages at the start of the year!

TRAVELING

To my favorite place this weekend! Woohoo!
